bibl.title: In Defense of a Historical Reading of P. Yale II 107 (= P. Giss. lit. 4.7).
bibl.note: P. Yale II, 107 (= M.-P.3 2218; LDAB 35). - The Content of the Cognitio extra Ordinem. - The Language. - The Rhetoric: the oratio recta. - Back to P. Yale II 107. - If P. Yale II 107 is not Fictional, or Semi-Fictional, but a Historical Text, What is it? [Perhaps a petition containing the reports of previous imperial rulings, related with the Alexandrian riots of 38 CE.]
GAMBETTI Sandra, In Defense of a Historical Reading of P. Yale II 107 (= P. Giss. lit. 4.7).
